title: Explain to the prisoner
description:
Most people share cells in this prison.

You have some information about them already, but you're now going to ask some questions.

The information they give will be recorded and may be used by other prison staff to support them and make everyone as safe as possible.

low.title: Current recommendation: shared cell
low.description: We've automatically run a background check that looks at your history in prison, offence, sentence and past behaviour. It's telling us that you may be safe to share a cell but I need to go through some questions with you before deciding.

high.title: Current recommendation: single cell
high.description: We've automatically run a background check that looks at your history in prison, sentence and past behaviour in prison. It's telling us that you should have your own cell.

unknown.title: No prisoner record
unknown.description:
You don't have a record of them on the system.

You're now going to ask them some questions

reasons: Based on a High VIPER result - This is what we know about your history in prison, offence, sentence and behaviour in prison. For your safety and the safety of others we think you should have your own cell.

title: How do you think they feel about sharing a cell at this moment?
description: Record anything you feel is relevant.

title: Have they indicated they might seriously hurt a cellmate?

reasons: Based on the concerns I have from your response to 'Do you think you might hurt someone you had to share cell with?' (Risk of hurting cell mate)

title: Do you think they might seriously hurt a cellmate because they're vulnerable?

reasons: Based on the concerns I have from your response to Have you been hurt or threatened in prison before? (Vulnerability)

title: Are they part of a gang, or likely to join a gang in prison?
Have they used drugs in the last month?
Do they have any hostile views or predjudices that mean they shouldn't share a cell with a particular group?

reasons: Based on the concerns I have from your response to questions related to: Gangs, drug use in the last month & you find it difficult to share a cell with a particular group. (Gang affiliation, drug misuse & prejudices and hostile views)

title: Are there any other reasons why you would recommend they have a single cell?

reasons: Based on the concerns I have (officers views)
